mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO ,B.TNO ,B.MNO ,B.BTYPE ,B.BTITLE ,B.BCONTENT ,B.BREG_DATE ,F.FNO ,F.FORI_NAME ,F.FPATH ,F.FTHUMB ,F.FREAL_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN FILEATTACH F ON B.BNO = F.BNO WHERE BTYPE= 'G' AND B.TNO = #{tno} ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT MAX(BREG_DATE) maxDate ,MIN(BREG_DATE) minDate FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN FILEATTACH F WHERE BTYPE= 'G' AND B.BNO = F.BNO AND B.TNO = #{tno} ORDER BY BREG_DATE ASC

SELECT B.BNO ,B.TNO ,B.MNO ,B.BTYPE ,B.BTITLE ,B.BCONTENT ,B.BREG_DATE ,F.FNO ,F.FORI_NAME ,F.FPATH ,F.FTHUMB ,F.FREAL_NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN FILEATTACH F WHERE B.BNO = F.BNO AND B.BTYPE = 'G' AND B.TNO = #{tno} AND B.MNO = #{mno} AND B.BNO = #{bno} AND F.FNO = #{fno}

SELECT M.MNO ,M.MNAME ,M.MPATH ,M.MEMAIL ,M.MPNO ,M.MGENDER ,M.MBASE_ADDR ,M.MDET_ADDR ,M.MPNO ,M.MBIRTH ,M.MLEADER_YN ,M.MENTER_YN ,M.MAPPLY_YN ,M.MPLAY_CNT ,M.MGOAL_CNT ,M.MSUPPORT_CNT ,M.MLOSS_CNT ,M.MPOSNAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN TEAM T WHERE M.TNO = T.TNO AND T.TNO = #{tno}
SELECT TNO ,TNAME ,TEPATH ,TREG_DATE ,TMEM_CNT ,TCONTENT ,TPOINT ,TLATITUDE ,TLONGITUDE FROM TEAM WHERE TNO = #{tno}
